summary: Lyon is the second biggest city in France, located where the Rhône and Saône rivers meet. It's an important economic hub with a rich history, known for its cuisine, silk production, and the invention of cinema. The city has beautiful architecture and is home to many students and important international organizations. Lyon is also famous for its light festival, the Fête des lumières. It's considered a major global city and is highly ranked for its quality of life.
title: Lyon
